channel.title: Authorization on CardFunc
channel.description: Recent content in Authorization on CardFunc

item.title: Authorization using CardFunc Element
item.description: To provide a user interface for an end-user to enter sensitive card information the CardFunc Element is used.

item.title: Authorization using token
item.description: Once an account token has been created, it can be used when creating new authorizations.

item.title: Authorization using PAN
item.description: Authorizations can be created using PAN directly. This approach adds many requirements in order to comply with PCI DSS-rules and is not recommended for most customers, however.
